column4: this is what i'm presented with in the terminal when i got to the upgrade of GRUB when upgrading from ubuntu 11.04 to 11.07: http://paste2.org/p/1727937
i'm more than happy to kill this upgrade by shuttin down the system, formatting my paritions through windows and starting over with installing 11.04
chances are you could just use your bios to select dual booting from, most of them allow you to select boot drive
